title: Forces - direction of acceleration from free body

content.description: The free-body diagram represents all the forces exerted on an object that is in motion, relative to the <math alttext="positive x" overflow="scroll"> <mo>+</mo> <mi>x</mi> </math> and <math alttext="positive y" overflow="scroll"><mo>+</mo><mi>y</mi></math> directions shown in the figure. The relative magnitude of each force is indicated by the length of each vector.
